alert.note: Alert for Barnstable (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 08 at 12:19PM EDT until August 08 at 1:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: The National Weather Service in Boston/Norton has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Barnstable County in southeastern Massachusetts... * Until 100 PM EDT. * At 1218 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 6 miles south of Provincetown to near Dennis to 6 miles south of Mashpee, moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Barnstable, Brewster, Provincetown, Yarmouth, Sandwich, Dennis, Mashpee, Harwich, Chatham, Orleans, Eastham, Wellfleet, Truro, and Hyannis. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
